comment: Frequency for F1 UI voice comms (for Force on Force type missions).
Frequency for F2 UI voice comms (for Force on Force type missions).
If set, the UHF Backup presets will be initialized with the UFC DTC values instead of the usual hardcoded internal values.
UI IVC Volume is controlled independently from the COMM1/2/UHF/VHF volume sliders.
UI IVC Volume in db, range -6 to +6 (if controlled independently).
The value in DB on how much to shift the UHF/VHF playback volume out of center (into opposite directions), range +/-100.0
Maximum number of voices allocated by the sound code.
How many milliseconds must elapse before the sound code updates.
This patch may fix the problem of AI comms disappearing.
This determine the distance at which the radio communications will use BRAA instead of BE, default 25.
If set, the comms menu (Tower/Awacs/Wingman ... etc ...) will no longer be drawn.
If set, the comms menu (Tower/Awacs/Wingman ... etc ...) will no longer be drawn.
Using Ring communications menu(0 for legacy menu)
